description:
As the news reports on Shishigami`s attack on the police station, Shishigami hijacks a broadcast signal to publicly declare war on Japan, claiming he will kill 100 people immediately. Ando realizes Shishigami`s plans and manages to thwart it with the help of Inuyashiki`s power. Undeterred, Shishigami continues his killing, and announces he will kill 1000 tomorrow, devastating Inuyashiki.
Source: Amazon
